alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 8:32AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 915 AM EST... At 832 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lynne, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Fruitland, Lake Como and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for northern and northeastern Florida.
